name: Slap AImazing!Delivery
description:
Become a GM of an automated delivery service in Slap,AImazing!delivery

Oversight bots their delivery! Inspect their route and confront the delivery address!

If a bot is going on the wrong direction all you need to do  is taking your slapstick and SLAP the responsible Ai supervisor on the bottom  of the screen! 

This will correct the delivery routes!

(If you slap without a reason you will be punished, we are  not promoting office abuse, is  just how the AIs are built)

Avoid wrong deliveries and abuse of your slap and survive through the workday!

Game Jam Wowie 4.0

Team Members

Massimo Mezzalira

Elias Wickander

Simon Makdesi

Realized in a shortened timespan of less than 48 hrs

Why?We have an unending passion of going to work and pay bills to survive.

Credits for external assets in  the download folder!
